name: Welcome to Drugland
description:
Story:

Its just you and the drugs. Go to Drugland and you will feel soooo goooood... why not its not that bad is it?

true ending coming soon!

How to play: 

WASD to move around

'E' to go to rooms

'T' to take the drug

Warning! taking the drug or leaving a room might not work but to make it work you have to move up against the wall and click the key, sorry for this inconvenience :(

Programmer:Blockhead Manic

Composer: Buyana114

Artist: MountainBoi
